main event: Pilot-co-pilot sighted a large brilliant spherical object change shape and color near Buffalo, New York, from 26 December 1960 to 9 January 1961.
interesting points: The object exhibited rapid circular motions before ascending and disappearing., Investigative officers found no physical evidence to support the UFO claim., Radar returns were traced to other moving aircraft., Observers initially believed the sightings may have been the planet Venus., The object was described as self-luminous with significant brightness difference compared to known celestial bodies.
witness description: pilot and co-pilot of an aircraft
